user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to send an email to me (mark.johnson@techcorp.com) with an update on the current candidates for the engineering team position and to consult her Notion for the necessary information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Candidate Status Update

Hi Jane,

Could you please send an email to Mark Johnson (mark.johnson@techcorp.com) with a current update on the engineering team candidates? When preparing the update, please consult your Notion workspace for the most recent details.

Thank you for keeping us informed!

Best regards,  
[Your Name]

final_output:
